REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E A RM f0836 reute b f BC-CANADA-LAUNCHES-1.2-B 03-02 0098

TEXT.TITLE: CANADA LAUNCHES 1.2 BILLION DLR BOND ISSUE
TEXT.BODY: Canada will offer a 1.2 billion dlr, four-part bond issue tomorrow, which will be dated March 15 and delivered March 16, the finance department said. The issue will consist of four maturities: - 8 pct bonds due July 1, 1990, - 8-1/4 pct bonds due March 1, 1994, - 8-1/4 pct bonds due March 1, 1997, - 8-1/2 pct bonds due June 1, 2011. The 2011 maturity will be issued to a maximum of 374 mln dlrs. The Bank of Canada will buy 100 mln dlrs of the new issue, including 10 mln dlrs of the 2011 maturity. Reuter
